Raul  has a brilliant career developed for 20 years working in Power Generation projects . He 
is an expert in the engineering  design for Power Generation plants . He has held leadership 
positions as Design Engineer, Project Engineer, Engineering Coordinator, Project Manager 
and Project Director. Large experience in all project phases from feasibility studies to E PC 
including OBE, FEED and EPCM .  
 
Raul  has moved from a Project Engineer  position  to P roject Engineering Manager , until 
being promoted as Project Director , position  that he has held for five years.

 Page 1 of 4  
Raul  has a brilliant career developed for 20 years working in Power Generation projects . He 
is an expert in the engineering  design for Power Generation plants . He has held leadership 
positions as Design Engineer, Project Engineer, Engineering Coordinator, Project Manager 
and Project Director. Large experience in all project phases from feasibility studies to E PC 
including OBE, FEED and EPCM .  
 
Raul  has moved from a Project Engineer  position  to P roject Engineering Manager , until 
being promoted as Project Director , position  that he has held for five years.  
 
As a Project Director  the most important recent EPC project has been the  convers ion to 
Combined Cycle of AES’s Los Mina Power Plant in Santo Doming o (Dominican Republic) . 
The project included  in its scope the following units: two heat recovery steam generators , 
one steam turbine, integration of the existing gas turbines  and expansion of the existing 
substation . The role require d significant interaction with Owner, local stakeholders  and 
suppliers to ensure effective coordination across all involved to ensure performanc e and 
delivery date . The position also required  significant travel, including relocating to Santo 
Domingo for extensive duration . 
 
Currently  Raul is  supporting on -going project s as sponsor and leading and  coordinating new 
proposals as Proposal Director in the Commercial Division to assure a strong pipeline of 
opportunities with  optimal organization between Engineering, Procureme nt and 
Construction departments.  
 
With Tecnicas Reunidas since 2014.

Page 3 of 4 CAREER HIGHLIGHTS  
Project Director  (2012-2021 ) 
• Working as Project Director in TR Project s, currently  he has been working in the Los 
Mina Combined Cycle Conversion Power Plant  for AES and as Proposal Director in 
the C ommercial Direction .  
• Before this , Raul  worked on Baja California  II Project in Mexico , a Power Plant  project 
consisting of the installation of three new gas turbines in the CFE’s Benito J uarez 
Power Complex  in Mexico .  
Project Engineering Manager  (2006-2012 ) 
• Work ing as Project Engineering  Manager in Acciona, he was part of the team in the 
first project of the company for the CFE, Mexican state -owned electric utility, 
marking the record of fastest commercial operation entry for an internal 
combustion power plant in Mexico.  
• Direction of all engineering execution activities , including third party engineering, 
ensur ing effective technical coordination with Clients and suppliers . Lead ing the 
internal and  external problem -solving necessary to arrive at appropriate 
engineering decisions , while ensur ing all changes were managed in accordance 
with the project procedures . 
• Significant travel  and relocation  to EPC location (construction site ) for the 
construction phase  and the commissioning phase.  
Project Engineer  (2002 -2004 ) 
• In charge of Mechanical Systems in different Power Generation and Industrial 
Projects  in IDOM Ingenieria Internacional .
